content: I'm getting a bunch of value set copyright statement warnings in the build and have no idea how to resolve. The value sets it is referring to are those created by Pharmacy WG because we couldn't find an appropriate one in SCT or other. What do I need to do to fix? Here's an example of the warning. [java] WARNING: phx:ValueSet[medicationdispense-status].copyright: Value set valueset-medicationdispense-status (MedicationDispense Status Codes): A copyright statement should be present for any value set that includes non-HL7 sourced codes (http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/medicationdispense-status)
there's something wrong there - they shouldn't be complaining about copyright. it's on my list to investigate
